thread.title: Late Late Show host Tubridy silent over guest offer to Gilligan
thread.title_full: Late Late Show host Tubridy silent over guest offer to Gilligan

title: Late Late Show host Tubridy silent over guest offer to Gilligan
text: Late Late Show host Tubridy silent over guest offer to Gilligan Independent.ie Host Ryan Tubridy yesterday refused to comment on the criticism surrounding The Late Late Show's decision to invite convicted drug trafficker John Gilligan to join him on the Friday night chat show.  news/courts/late-late-show-host-tubridy-silent-over-guest-offer-to-gilligan-35462902.html http://www.independent.ie/incoming/article35461850.ece/38acd/AUTOCROP/h342/X-_96DPI_Late-Late%202.jpg Late Late Show host Ryan Tubridy and inset John Gilligan and Veronica Guerin Host Ryan Tubridy yesterday refused to comment on the criticism surrounding The Late Late Show's decision to invite convicted drug trafficker John Gilligan to join him on the Friday night chat show.
